select c.fid as id, c.fnumber as num,c.flongnumber as longNumber,c.fname_l2 as title, c.FAssigned as assigned,c.FLevel,c.FDescription_l2 as description, c.FCurProject as projectName,c.FFullOrgUnit as fullOrgUnit, b.FNAME_L2 as orgName,e.ftype as controlType from T_FDC_CostAccount c left join T_ORG_BaseUnit b on b.fid=c.FFULLORGUNIT left join T_CON_MarketProjectCostEntry e on e.FCOSTACCOUNTID=c.FID
e.FHEADID=#{marketId}
and c.fname_l2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{title}),'%')
and b.FNAME_L2 like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{orgName}),'%')
and c.fnumber like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{num}),'%')
order by c.fnumber
select distinct fmpcostaccountid from T_CON_ContractBill where FMARKETPROJECTID=#{marketId}
